name: Elliot Schumacher
body:
I am a Masters Student at the [Language Technologies Institute](http://www.lti.cs.cmu.edu/), [School of Computer Science at Carnegie Mellon University](http://www.cs.cmu.edu/), working with Maxine Eskenazi.  My research focuses on Natural Language Processing for Education.  Before attending CMU, I received a B.S. in [Computer Science](https://cse.osu.edu/) and [Linguistics](http://linguistics.osu.edu/) from Ohio State University.

Here is my cv.

### Publications

####2016

* E. Schumacher, M. Eskenazi, G. Frishkoff, K. Collins-Thompson. (To appear.) Predicting the Relative Difficulty of Single Sentences With and Without Surrounding Context. _Proceedings of the 2016 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP 2016)._

### Contact Information
eschumac (at) cs.cmu.edu
